title: User Registration with Valid Data
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register with valid input data and is assigned the correct role.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Fill in all mandatory fields with valid data (email, password, role selection).
Submit the registration form.
Confirm registration success message is displayed and user is assigned the selected role.
Verify user entry is created in the backend with correct role assignment.

title: User Registration with Invalid Email Format
description: Verify system rejects registration when the email format is invalid.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Fill in registration form using an invalid email format.
Submit the registration form.
Check that appropriate error message about invalid email format is displayed.
Verify no user account is created in the system.

title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Verify user can sign in successfully with correct credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input valid username/email and password.
Click the login button.
Verify user is authenticated and redirected to the appropriate dashboard based on role.

title: User Login with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify system rejects login attempts with incorrect password or non-existent email.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input incorrect username/email or password.
Click the login button.
Check appropriate error message for invalid login is displayed.
Verify user remains unauthenticated.

title: Role-Based Access Control Verification
description: Verify access restrictions and navigation vary correctly for customer, vendor, and admin roles.

steps.description: Login as customer.
Ensure customer can access marketplace, shopping cart, order history, and review submission features.
Ensure customer cannot access vendor or admin dashboards.
Login as vendor.
Verify vendor can access vendor dashboard for product management, orders, and statistics.
Verify vendor cannot access admin dashboard.
Login as admin.
Verify admin can access admin dashboard with platform management and analytics.

title: Vendor Product Creation with Valid Data
description: Verify that vendor can successfully create a new product with valid information.

steps.description: Login as a vendor.
Navigate to 'New Product' page.
Fill in product details including name, description, price, stock quantity, and category.
Submit the product creation form.
Verify product is listed under vendor’s products with correct details.

title: Vendor Product Update and Delete Operations
description: Verify vendor can update existing product details and delete a product successfully.

steps.description: Login as a vendor.
Navigate to existing product edit page.
Modify product details and save changes.
Confirm product details are updated correctly.
Delete the product.
Verify product is removed from vendor’s listing and marketplace.

title: Marketplace Product Search and Category Filtering
description: Verify customers can browse all products, use category filters, and get search suggestions in real-time.

steps.description: Navigate to the marketplace page.
Type a partial product name in the search bar.
Check that relevant product suggestions appear within 500ms.
Apply category filter.
Verify displayed products belong only to selected category.
Ensure combined search and filtering still delivers relevant results quickly.

title: Product Detail Page Display and Add to Cart
description: Verify product detail page shows all necessary info and allows adding item to cart.

steps.description: Open a product detail page.
Confirm product name, description, price, stock availability, and reviews are visible.
Select quantity and click 'Add to Cart'.
Verify the item is added to the shopping cart with correct quantity.

title: Shopping Cart Management with Multi-Vendor Items
description: Verify customer can add items from multiple vendors, update quantities, and remove items with real-time UI updates.

steps.description: Add products from different vendors to the cart.
Verify cart groups items correctly by vendor.
Change item quantities in the cart.
Verify cart total updates in real-time with correct quantities.
Remove one or more items from the cart.
Verify items are removed and UI refreshes accordingly.

title: Checkout Flow with Order Splitting and Stock Verification
description: Verify that checkout collects shipping details, splits orders into sub-orders by vendor, updates stock, and creates the order successfully.

steps.description: Proceed to checkout with multi-vendor items in cart.
Fill shipping address form with valid data.
Confirm and place the order.
Verify payment is initiated securely.
Confirm order is split into sub-orders per vendor.
Verify stock levels for ordered products are reduced accordingly.
Check order summarization is visible in customer order history.

title: Order History and Sub-Order Status Display
description: Verify customer can view order history with accurate details and status for each sub-order by vendor.

steps.description: Login as a customer.
Navigate to order history page.
Verify all past orders are listed with accurate date, total amount, and status.
Expand an order to see sub-orders grouped by vendor with individual statuses.

title: Payment Processing with Commission Deduction and Payout Tracking
description: Verify payments are processed securely, platform commission is deducted automatically, and payouts to vendors are correctly tracked.

steps.description: Complete an order checkout with valid payment details.
Verify payment is authorized and processed via secure channel (PCI-DSS standards).
Confirm platform commission is calculated and deducted from vendor payouts.
Check vendor payout records reflect accurate amounts after commission deduction.

title: Review Submission and Display
description: Verify customers can submit product and vendor reviews which are immutable by vendors except for replies, with aggregated ratings displayed.

steps.description: Login as customer and navigate to a purchased product page.
Submit a product review with rating and comments.
Verify review is visible on product page and aggregated rating updates.
Navigate to vendor page and submit a vendor review.
Verify vendor review appears with aggregated ratings.
Login as vendor and attempt to edit or delete submitted customer reviews.
Confirm vendors cannot modify customer reviews but can post replies.
Vendor posts a reply to a customer review.
Verify vendor reply is displayed correctly under the review.

title: Notification Delivery and Preference Management
description: Verify that order, payment, and platform event notifications are delivered via email and push based on user preferences.

steps.description: Login as user and navigate to notification settings.
Set preferences for receiving notifications via email only.
Perform an action triggering an order status change.
Verify email notification is received and no push notification is sent.
Change preferences to enable push notifications.
Trigger a payment update notification.
Verify notifications are received timely via push and email.

title: Admin Dashboard User and Vendor Management
description: Verify admin can approve, suspend, and manage users and vendors, configure commission rates, and view analytics.

steps.description: Login as admin and navigate to admin dashboard.
Review pending vendor applications and approve them.
Verify approved vendors gain access to vendor dashboard.
Suspend a vendor and verify they lose access appropriately.
Update platform commission rate configuration.
Verify commission rate updates affect new transactions correctly.
Verify analytics dashboard displays accurate user, vendor, and sales data.

title: Performance Testing for Marketplace Search Response
description: Verify product search returns results within 500 milliseconds under normal load.

steps.description: Perform multiple product searches with various queries using real users.
Measure response time for each search.
Assert that 95% of searches return results within 500ms.

title: Security Test - Access Unauthorized Pages
description: Verify that users cannot access pages or features outside their roles by using direct URLs or API calls.

steps.description: Login as customer and attempt to visit vendor or admin dashboard URLs.
Verify access is denied and user is redirected or shown error.
Login as vendor and attempt to access admin dashboard URLs.
Verify access is denied appropriately.
Attempt unauthorized API calls modifying data outside user role permission.
Verify API calls are rejected with authorized error.

title: Shopping Cart Persistence Across Sessions
description: Verify that items added to the cart persist correctly across user logouts and browser sessions.

steps.description: Login as customer and add multiple items to cart.
Logout from the platform.
Login again as the same customer.
Verify previously added cart items and quantities are intact.

title: Order Checkout with Insufficient Stock
description: Verify system prevents order completion if requested quantity exceeds available stock and displays an error message.

steps.description: Add a product to cart with quantity greater than current stock.
Attempt to proceed to checkout and place order.
Verify checkout is blocked and an informative error about insufficient stock is displayed.
